cyclone.name: CRISTOBAL
cyclone.current_location: about 95 miles west of Campeche, Mexico
cyclone.trajectory: expected to meander in the southern Bay of Campeche through mid-week, then gradually lift northward into the central Gulf of Mexico late in the 5-day period
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: southern Bay of Campeche coast of Mexico (near Campeche/Veracruz)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Watch/Warning limited to Campeche to Puerto de Veracruz, Mexico (no U.S. coastline)
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning: Campeche to Puerto de Veracruz, Mexico
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Southern Bay of Campeche and adjacent Mexican coastline
weather_observation.closest_wind_data_location: VERACRUZ MX (closest listed point in probability table)
